name: Haus Heimat
description: Comfortable holiday apartment for 2-4 persons, 1 or 2 bedrooms with radio, lounge with cable TV,  fully equipped kitchen,  shower/WC or bath/WC  and balcony.
Dogs allowed! Dogs 3,70.- Euro without feed. final cleaning charge € 10,- per person
Check in 15.00hr, check out 10.00hr; Einfahrt Mitte at Mayrhofen, cross the main road, first road on the right, Waldbadstrasse, look for signs for the adventure swimming pool (Erlebnisbad).

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: Comfortable holiday apartments, suitable for 2 or 4 persons, 1 or 2 bedrooms with radio, lounge with cable TV, fully equipped kitchen, shower/WC, or bath/WC and balcony.
